text:
[Verse]
Walking through the night
Stars are shining bright
Moon is in the sky
Dreams begin to fly

[Verse 2]
Hopes up in the air
Whispers everywhere
Feel the magic start
Listen to your heart

[Chorus]
Moonlit dreams take flight
Dancing in the light
Hold on tight let's go
Feel our spirits glow

[Verse 3]
Underneath the moon
We will find it soon
Hidden paths to seek
Mysteries we peek

[Chorus]
Moonlit dreams take flight
Dancing in the light
Hold on tight let's go
Feel our spirits glow

[Bridge]
In the night so calm
Feel the soothing balm
Chasing shadows play
Never fade away
title: Moonlit Dreams
